node.title: 'She's nothing like me': Lady Gaga responds to rumours she stayed in character for 18 months for House of Gucci
node.alt: The film features an all-star cast including Adam Driver, Al Pacino, Jared Leto, Salma Hayek and Jeremy Irons.
node.description: Lady Gaga admits she spent nine months in character for her role as Patrizia Reggiani in a film exploring the 1995 murder-for-hire of the heir to Gucci fashion dynasty.
node.content:
["Murder. Mystery. Fashion.", "The red carpet was rolled out in London on Tuesday for the world premiere of House of Gucci,\u00a0Lady Gaga's second major film role.", "But despite an\u00a0all-star cast\u00a0\u2014 including Adam Driver, Al Pacino, Jared Leto, Salma Hayek and Jeremy Irons \u2014 there was one question on everyone's mind.", "Did Lady Gaga really stay\u00a0in character\u00a0for 18 months?", "", "
Lady Gaga hits the\u00a0red carpet for the world premiere in London.(Reuters:\u00a0Henry Nicholls)
", "Exploring the 1995 murder-for-hire of\u00a0Maurizio Gucci, the heir to the Italian fashion dynasty, the film has Gaga playing\u00a0Patrizia Reggiani, his ex-wife who was subsequently convicted of orchestrating the hit.", "\"I had a romantic relationship with my character, Patrizia,\" she told reporters in response to the rumours.", "\"I don't know where 18 months came from. Nine months, yes, but double that, I don't know.\"", "Earlier this month, the Star is Born actress told\u00a0British Vogue\u00a0she had \"lived as Patrizia for a year and a half\", and \"spoke with an accent for nine months of that\".", "", "
Lady Gaga plays\u00a0Patrizia Reggiani (pictured)\u00a0who was convicted of orchestrating her ex-husband's murder.(IMDB)
", "
What is House of Gucci again?
", "Directed by Ridley Scott, the movie \u2014 based on the book of the same name \u2014 retells the notorious murder case which shocked Italy and its fashion industry in the 1990s.", "Donning an Italian accent, Gaga plays Patrizia Reggiani who married into the Gucci family in 1972 when she wed heir Maurizio Gucci, played by Driver.\u00a0The couple divorced in 1994.", "", "
Patrizia Reggiani, played by Gaga, married into the Gucci family in 1972.(IMDB)
", "Speaking to The Wall Street Journal last month, Gaga said she\u00a0wanted to \"make a real person out of Patrizia, not a caricature\".", "\"Not an Italian-American woman but an Italian woman.\"", "
What really happened?
", "At the outset, Maurizio and Patrizia appeared happy. Their soaring wealth had bought them grandeur most could only dream of \u2014 properties across the globe, a super yacht and a fleet of luxury cars (not to mention the coveted socialite status).", "", "
Maurizio\u00a0was walking into his office on Via Palestro 20 in Milan when he was shot dead by an unidentified gunman.(Wikimedia Commons)
", "But beneath the surface, all was not as it seemed.", "Maurizio had taken\u00a0up with a new woman. His spending escalated.\u00a0", "On March 27, 1995 \u2014 about one year after their divorce \u2014 the Gucci heir was walking into his office on Via Palestro 20 in Milan when he was shot dead by an unidentified gunman.", "Patrizia, who had been less than subtle about her wishes for Maurizio's death, was an immediate suspect. With little evidence, however, the case went cold \u2014 but it wouldn't last.", "", "
Patrizia\u00a0Reggiani (centre) went on trial in 1998.(Reuters)
", "In 1997, a tip-off led to Patrizia's sensational arrest and subsequent trial, where it was revealed she had hired four accomplices to carry out the murder.", "She spent 18 years in jail for orchestrating the hit\u00a0and was released in 2016.", "
Understandably, not everyone is happy the story is being aired
", "The great-grandchildren of Guccio Gucci, who founded the luxury fashion house, made headlines earlier this year when they appealed to\u00a0Scott to respect their family\u2019s legacy.", "One of Maurizio's second cousins, Patrizia Gucci, feared the film would pry into the private lives of the Guccio Gucci heirs.", "", "
Gaga said she was wanted to \"make a real person out of Patrizia, not a caricature\".(IMDB)
", "\"Our family has an identity, privacy. We can talk about everything. but there is a borderline that cannot be crossed.\"", "
That hasn't stopped the buzz, though
", "The red carpet was rolled out for the world premiere at Odeon Leicester Square in London on Tuesday, ahead of its debut in cinemas later this month.", "And much like the movie,\u00a0the reviews have been a ride.", "", "
Cast members Jared Leto (left), Adam Driver, and Lady Gaga arrive for\u00a0the premiere of\u00a0House\u00a0of\u00a0Gucci.(Reuters:\u00a0Henry Nicholls)
", "Entertainment Weekly dubbed it \"an absurdly enjoyable Italian soap opera\", while the Observer labelled it an \"overwrought slog without any discernible direction\".", "And while Vanity Fair declared Gaga \"officially a Best-Actress contender\", the outlet noted\u00a0the film's heavy-handed soundtrack and wild wigs made it difficult\u00a0\"to take\u00a0it seriously in an awards context\".", "ABC/Reuters"]
